name: diana-greenconnect
description: Diana GreenConnect is a trip-planning block that lets users schedule transport to and from activities with time constraints like start time, end time, and duration.
author: zuugleservices

scripts.plugin-zip: cp build/diana-greenconnect/ diana-greenconnect/ || xcopy .\build\diana-greenconnect\ .\diana-greenconnect\ /E /C /Y && cp build/blocks-manifest.php ./blocks-manifest.php || xcopy /S /-I /Q /Y /F .\build\blocks-manifest.php .\blocks-manifest.php  && wp-scripts plugin-zip && rm -rf diana-greenconnect/ || rd /s /q .\diana-greenconnect\ && rm ./blocks-manifest.php || del blocks-manifest.php
